channel.title: Compiling Error Episode 2
channel.description:
okay so when i added this new thing called funfight i added the required stuff at the bottom of server.JAVA i got this error
[code]server.java:203: class, interface, or enum expected public int funfight = 0; ^ server.java:206: class, interface, or enum expected ffHandler = new ffHandler(); ^ server.java:208: class, interface, or enum expected public static ffHandler ffHandler = null; ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
help?

item.title: Compiling Error Episode 2
item.dc:creator: @Ncarug01 Ncarug01
item.description:
@Ncarug01 wrote:

ok i tried that heres my results

server.java:202: class, interface, or enum expected { ^ server.java:204: class, interface, or enum expected public static ffHandler ffHandler = null; ^ server.java:205: class, interface, or enum expected public int funfight = 0; ^ server.java:206: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Error Episode 2
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

{
	ffHandler = new ffHandler();
	public static ffHandler ffHandler = null;
	public int funfight = 0;
	}

That’s just a random code bock, you can’t just place a code block like that.

Read full topic

sorry to ask all these questions im still a noob
